_documentation._description: GitHub Copilot optimized MCP server configuration

_usage.description: Copy this configuration to your workspace .vscode/mcp.json file

_availableTools: init_project - Initialize project with COPILOT.md files and memory bank
store_memory - Store information in the three-tier memory system
search_memory - Search across all memory tiers
create_mode - Create a GitHub Copilot chat mode file
heal_chat_mode - Fix a chat mode that isn't working correctly
_requirements: VS Code with GitHub Copilot extension
Place this config in .vscode/mcp.json in your workspace
